code:
```verilog
module TopModule(
    input logic clk,
    input logic ar,
    input logic d,
    output logic q
);

    // On asynchronous reset, set q to 0
    always_ff @(posedge clk or posedge ar) begin
        if (ar) begin
            q <= 1'b0;
        end else begin
            q <= d;
        end
    end

endmodule
```
